'''The Lioness and the Blazing Sun''' is [[Dehya]]'s Default [[Character Outfit]].

==Appearance==
<!-- Keep appearance section short and concise. Limit to 1-2 paragraphs (preferably 1 paragraph) with 3-4 sentences each. -->
Dehya's hair is stylized to resemble cat ears and she wears a golden triangular earring on her left ear.

Dehya wears an outfit consisting of black knee-high boots, shorts, a belt, and elbow-length fingerless gloves, with a top consisting of black and red fabric. The entire outfit has gold-colored armor pieces attached: kneepads and wrist guards on both sides; a pauldron, vambrace, and gauntlet on her right arm, and a single bangle on her left bicep.  She also wears a dark red feathered cape with two gold decorations hanging from it, and her {{Pyro}} [[Vision]] hangs from her belt just behind her right hip.
